title: Introducing Australian football [Italian version]
creator_credit: Malcolm Smith, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Victorian Football League’s 1972 Grand Final, between the Carlton and Richmond teams is the dramatic background used to explain the rules and techniques of play. Includes slow-motion and free-frame techniques, playing positions, rules, penaltiesand the five types of kick employed. Commentary in Italian.
